# MAEngine Documentation

> MAEngine is a multiplayer game server toolkit with Rust core, LuaJIT scripting, QUIC transport, and Unreal Engine 5 clients.

This documentation covers the Lua scripting API for both server-side (Rust) and client-side (Unreal C++) game development.

## Documentation

- [Full Documentation](https://engine.modatlas.io/llms-full.txt): Complete documentation in a single file for LLM consumption
- [API Reference](https://engine.modatlas.io/docs/scripting): Scripting API reference
- [EmmyLua Types](https://engine.modatlas.io/docs/scripting/types.lua): Type definitions for IDE autocomplete

## Individual Pages

Individual documentation pages can be accessed as markdown by appending `.mdx` to any docs URL:
- `https://engine.modatlas.io/docs/scripting.mdx`
- `https://engine.modatlas.io/docs/scripting/server/database.mdx`
- `https://engine.modatlas.io/docs/scripting/client/webui.mdx`

## Key Topics

- **Server API**: Server lifecycle, Player management, Character spawning, Database (SurrealDB)
- **Client API**: WebUI (HTML/CSS/JS), Input handling, Trace/Raycasting, Store (state sync)
- **Shared API**: Vec3, Quat, Rotator, Color, Timer, Events

## Source Code

The MAEngine source is proprietary. This documentation covers the public Lua scripting API.
